queries.query: Large fiend that uses forest camouflage and is highly deceptive

queries.variant: sneaky fiend that can hide and control the terrain

queries.variant: evil chaotic creature capable of grappling and trapping foes

queries.variant: fiend that lives in forests and doesn't need to eat or sleep
